job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving the AI system' directly relates to the process of refining and enhancing AI models, which falls under the core definition of Modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Reviewing AI outputs and participating in fine-tuning sessions are explicit actions taken to train and adapt AI models, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the practical application and integration of AI capabilities into a functional system (customer support), which aligns with Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing AI tools and methodologies are direct activities involved in the development and evaluation of AI models, thus belonging to the Modeling category.

soft_skills.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on improving existing AI systems through feedback and fine-tuning, rather than building novel generative AI applications. While it mentions 'AI tools and methodologies', it lacks the specific details of core GenAI tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or PEFT. The emphasis is more on AI-augmented customer service and iterative AI improvement.
